title: Hub
description: A landing page template for benefit categories providing overviews, navigation, and contact information.

frontMatter.title: Hub
frontMatter.description: A landing page template for benefit categories providing overviews, navigation, and contact information.
frontMatter.intro: Hub pages serve as landing pages for specific benefit categories, providing overviews, navigation, and contact information for VA benefits and services.

when_to_use.value: **Benefit landing pages.** Provide a parent page for a section offering specific benefits or services.
**Core audience benefits.** Create landing pages listing all VA benefits available for Veterans, transitioning service members, or family members.

when_not_to_use.value: **Campaign landing pages.** Use a Campaign Landing Page template instead.
**Custom benefit groupings.** By health condition or audience segment - explore alternative templates.

usability.value: **Don't overwhelm visitors.** Highlight the most important content rather than every child page.
**Avoid unnecessary content.** Don't create content just to fill template sections.
**Stay within template.** Don't add sections beyond the template design.
**Follow section guidance.** Refer to component documentation for individual sections.

structure.intro: The hub consists of intro, spokes (core content), and right rail sections.

sections.title: Hub icon and page title
sections.description: Consistent, benefit-specific icon with descriptive title.

sections.title: Intro text
sections.description: High-level benefit overview with SEO-rich content, plus 'On this page' navigation.

sections.title: Critical alert (optional)
sections.description: Limited to 2 specific alerts; max 1 per hub.

sections.title: 'Manage benefits' spoke
sections.description: Usage, tracking, and management content (max 10 links).

sections.title: 'More resources' spoke
sections.description: Related tools and benefit rate information (max 10 links).

sections.title: Related benefits
sections.description: Links to other VA benefits outside this hub (max 5 links).

sections.title: Promo spot
sections.description: Highlighted service or key information (right rail).

sections.title: 'Connect with us' accordion
sections.description: Social media and administrative links (right rail).

content_guidelines.value: Link labels should match destination page titles with descriptive additions when needed.
Order links by frequency of use within manage and resources sections.
Keep teaser text concise and descriptive.
Maximum 10 links per spoke, 5 for related benefits.

accessibility.value: Ensure 'On this page' navigation aids screen readers.
Test with accessibility annotations for applications.
